```{r}
# add weekdays/weekends

wday1 <- c("Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday")
wday2 <- c("Saturday","Sunday")
cbs_dt$wday <- weekdays(as.Date(cbs_dt$start_date))
cbs_dt$wday[cbs_dt$wday %in%  wday1] <- "weekday"
cbs_dt$wday[cbs_dt$wday %in%  wday2] <- "weekend"

```
